import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List Children of Parent (Azure)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/cloud-accounts-manager/v1/cloudAccounts/azureAccounts/{parent_id}/children"}></MethodEndpoint>



Lists all the children, both management groups and subscriptions, under the given parent. A parent can be either an Azure tenant or a management group.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"parent_id","in":"path","description":"Parent Resource ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}>

Azure cloud account parameters

</div></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>cloudAccount</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span><span className={"openapi-schema__divider"}></span><span className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"accountId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Azure account ID"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"accountType"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`tenant`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Cloud Account Type","enum":["tenant"]}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"clientId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Application (Client) ID"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"environmentType"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`azure`, `azure_gov`, `azure_china`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"* **azure** - Applicable for Prisma China Stack.","enum":["azure","azure_gov","azure_china"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"key"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Application key/client secret"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"monitorFlowLogs"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"Automatically ingest flow logs"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"servicePrincipalId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Service Principal ID"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tenantId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Directory (Tenant) ID"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"rootSyncEnabled"} required={true} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"true = Azure tenant has children.
